name: Beat Hop 3D
description:
A variety of the latest pop music, all the familiar songs you've heard are here.
You must have never played a music game.
Double impact of color and rhythm
You will love this free game.


How to play

1, drag a single finger to move left and right
2, jump to the brick of the corresponding color
3, jump with the rhythm
4, keep a normal heart, in order to come to the end



Game features
1, a lot of popular songs
2, excellent sense of rhythm
3, simple operation
4, free


Tip: It is easier to find the drop point according to the color of the ball.
